machine_end_gcode.default_value:
G1 X5 Y{machine_depth*0.95} F{speed_travel*60} ; present print
M140 S0 ; turn off heat bed
M104 S0 ; turn off temperature
M84; disable motors              ; disable stepper motors

G9111 bedTemp={material_bed_temperature} extruderTemp={material_print_temperature}
M117 ;display LCD message
M900 K0.05 ;linear advance factor, ive only seen this set to k0.05

G21 ; set units to millimeters
G90 ; use absolute coordinates
T0 ;set or report the current extruder or other tool
M107 ; turn fan off
